messages.message:
Could someone confirm whether this API is paginated?
```'https://instabase.com/youssef/my-repo/get_tree_nodes/Instabase%20Drive/input/drivers-licences/out/s2_map_records'```
If this directory `s2_map_records` has more than 200 files, the first 200 files only will get returned.

If so, is there a way to override this behavior and return all the files?
Yup this is paginated! At one point I didn't want it paginated so I recursively got all the pages (as long as has_more was true in the response I think)
I don't see a way to override it and get all in pythonland, let me check go
but this limits how many files we can use with refiner
since this API won’t return more than 200 files, we won’t be able to benchmark refiner 5 with more than 200 files
It also returns a flag has_more along with a next_page_token, so you can check in the response if it has that and if so, make another call
